alert.note: Alert for Greene; Pickens; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:51PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Tuscaloosa, central Pickens and northeastern Greene Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lake Lurleen State Park to near Jena to near Pickensville. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tuscaloosa, Northport, Aliceville, Gordo, Carrollton, Pickensville, Holt, Moundville, Coaling, Coker, Union, McMullen, McFarland Mall, Benevola, Johnston Lake, Lake Lurleen State Park, Tuscaloosa Amphitheater, Tuscaloosa Regional Airport, Lake Wildwood and Shelton State Community College. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and west central Alabama.
